mapper.select: SELECT ADMIN_SEQ, ADMIN_ID, ADMIN_PASSWORD, ADMIN_NICKNAME FROM ADMIN WHERE admin_id = #{adminId}
mapper.update: UPDATE QUESTION SET QUESTION_STATUS = 'T' WHERE QUESTION_SEQ = #{questionSeq}
mapper.select: select count(*) FROM question where QUESTION_STATUS = 'T'

select * from (select ROWNUM as no, Q.QUESTION_SEQ, Q.QUESTION_CONTENT, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME from MEMBER M right join QUESTION Q on M.MEMBER_SEQ = Q.MEMBER_SEQ where Q.QUESTION_STATUS = 'F') where no between #{rowStart} and #{rowEnd} ORDER BY QUESTION_SEQ

select * from (select rownum as no, question_seq, question_content, member_nickname, member_seq from (select Q.QUESTION_SEQ, Q.QUESTION_CONTENT, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, M.MEMBER_SEQ from MEMBER M right join QUESTION Q on M.MEMBER_SEQ = Q.MEMBER_SEQ where Q.QUESTION_STATUS= 'T' order by question_seq) order by rownum) where no between #{rowStart} and #{rowEnd}

select * from (select ROWNUM as rn, B.BOARD_SEQ, B.BOARD_TITLE, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, B.BOARD_COUNT, B.BOARD_LIKE, TO_CHAR(B.BOARD_REG_DAY,'yyyy.mm.dd') BOARD_REG_DAY from MEMBER M right join BOARD B on M.MEMBER_SEQ = B.MEMBER_SEQ) where rn BETWEEN #{rowStart} and #{rowEnd} ORDER BY BOARD_SEQ DESC

select B.BOARD_TITLE , M.MEMBER_NICKNAME , B.BOARD_COUNT , B.BOARD_LIKE , B.BOARD_CONTENT , Q.QUESTION_CONTENT , B.BOARD_SEQ, TO_CHAR(B.BOARD_REG_DAY,'yyyy.mm.dd') BOARD_REG_DAY from MEMBER M right join BOARD B on M.MEMBER_SEQ = B.MEMBER_SEQ join QUESTION Q on B.QUESTION_SEQ = Q.QUESTION_SEQ where B.BOARD_SEQ = #{boardSeq}
select count(*) FROM QUESTION where QUESTION_STATUS = 'F'
